sentences.en: A magnificent baroque arbor of lindens brings you to 16 th century.
sentences.cn: 华丽的带有巴洛克风格的菩提树林荫路把人们带回16世纪.

sentences.en: From 1755 to 1768 , the conventual area was rebuilt in Baroque style.
sentences.cn: 修道院社区于公元1755年-1768年按巴罗克式的风格重建.

sentences.en: Furniture of the baroque period can be recognized by its ornate carvings.
sentences.cn: 巴罗克时期的家具以豪华的雕刻作为鉴别标志.

sentences.en: He was a baroque figure dressed in theatrical, but elegant, clothes.
sentences.cn: 他是个巴罗克式的人物，衣着华丽但又不失优雅。

sentences.en: In Germany the baroque style of art flourished in the 17 th and 18 th centuries.
sentences.cn: 在德国,巴罗克艺术风格在17和18世纪非常盛行.

sentences.en: Late Baroque towns of the Val di Noto, Italy.
sentences.cn: 意大利诺托谷的晚期巴罗克风格城镇.

sentences.en: Paul Muldoon is one of the most baroque of contemporary poets.
sentences.cn: 保罗·马尔登，现代诗人中语言最为精致华丽者之一

sentences.en: Such decoration was a typical feature of the baroque period.
sentences.cn: 这种装饰是巴罗克时期的特徵.

sentences.en: That big baroque bead - nothing much - if I'm offered four dollars for it tomorrow I'll be in luck.
sentences.cn: 那颗奇形怪状的值不了多少钱的大珠子 - 如果明天有人给我四块钱,就算我好运气.

sentences.en: The baroque church of San Leonardo is worth a quick look.
sentences.cn: 圣莱昂纳多的巴洛克式教堂值得一看。

sentences.en: the baroque frontage of Milan Cathedral
sentences.cn: 米兰大教堂巴罗克风格的正面

sentences.en: The baroque gave way to a long period of classical architecture.
sentences.cn: 巴洛克式最后被长寿命的古典建筑所代替.

sentences.en: The baroque style is rich in ornament.
sentences.cn: 巴罗克风格极具装饰性.

sentences.en: The baroque style or period in art, architecture, or music.
sentences.cn: 这个建筑样式非常奇特,有着巴洛克式的豪华 、 浮夸和精雕细琢.

sentences.en: They found the baroque architecture amusing.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得这奇异的建筑式样令人发笑.

trans.tran_cn: 巴罗克式的，巴罗克风格的，过分装饰的，奇形怪状的
trans.tran_en: relating to the very decorated style of art, music, buildings etc, that was common in Europe in the 17th and early 18th centuries

trans.tran_cn: 巴洛克时期艺术和建筑风格的, 巴洛克式
trans.tran_en: used to describe baroque art, music, buildings etc
